citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55 pm on
01-Aug-17. The inspectors knocked on the facility door, called the provided contact number, and waited in driveway
for approximately one hour in attempts to contact the licensee. All attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection during business hours.
Additional Inspectors
Welch Scott, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55 pm on
01-Aug-17.  The inspectors knocked on the facility door, called the provided contact number, and waited in driveway
for approximately one hour in attempts to contact the licensee.  All attempts were unsuccessful.
 A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection during business hours.
Additional Inspectors
Welch Scott, Veterinary Medical Officer
